column5: Excellent beachside 2 bed 2 bath condo, sleeps 8, with private beach access, large pool for kids and family, bar-b-que pits, tennis courts, gym and more.   Gulfpoint Condominiums is great for families and is walking distance from Schilitterbahn Water Park and many popular South Padre Island restaurants.
column8: PRIVATE GATED ISLAND RESORT! GREAT FAMILY GETAWAY!
